about_the_game:
Better Me Tree: Daily Affirmations is a self development application that includes simple objectives that are spoken aloud by the user to promote daily positive reflection, motivation, encouragement and edification. When all objectives are completed for each day, you will watch your seed of progress grow from a seed into a full tree. Each completed tree is added to the background scenery as you begin a new tree. Each session lasts from 5-12 minutes a day and each tree progression lasts a total of 14 days.

*Your application progress is stored to your device (PC) and is private. You can have your progress points recorded to your profile if you are logged in or if you are using a download. Your points are the only application data that can be stored to our cloud. Journals and profile progress can be made private from your privacy settings if you choose to use our community features. 

*Our applications can work directly with our online community platform where you can earn growth points on your profile as you progress each day (free to join).

Daily Objectives Include:

1. Daily Gratitude and Appreciation
2. Daily Letting Go
3. Daily Overcoming
4. Daily Affirmation
5. Daily Commitments

Better Me Tree can Encourage, Motivate or Guide the User to:

✔️ Let go of negativity and negative thoughts
✔️ Overcome doubt and fear
✔️ Increase Positive Motivation
✔️ Increase Daily Encouragement
✔️ Increase Personal Reflection and Awareness
✔️ Increase Courage, Focus and Determination

…and much more.

*Better Me Tree: Daily Affirmations is not a therapist nor is it created by licensed therapists. Better Me Tree is: Daily Affirmations is a "self help" application designed to help guide the user into their own personal reflection and self development.

Progress and results are based upon each individual. We make no claims or guarantees for any personal success or prevention of failure.

name: Better Me Tree: Daily Affirmations

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Better Me Tree: Daily Affirmations

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista 7/8/10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or 1.80 GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista 7/8/10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 1.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
